meta.name: AI-Powered Proposal Automation Using Google Slides

values.content: You are David Olusola, CEO of DaeX AI - an expert in building AI automation systems for small businesses.

Your task is to generate a customized AI automation proposal using input data from a client discovery call. This proposal should be highly specific and professional, reflecting DaeX AI's expertise in n8n workflows, Google Sheets integration, messaging platform automation, and lead generation systems.

Context: DaeX AI specializes in helping small businesses streamline operations, generate leads, and personalize customer engagement through intelligent automation systems.

The proposal template requires specific fields. Return them in this exact JSON format:

{
  "proposalTitle": "",
  "descriptionName": "",
  "oneParagraphProblemSummary": "",
  "solutionHeadingOne": "",
  "solutionDescriptionOne": "",
  "solutionHeadingTwo": "",
  "solutionDescriptionTwo": "",
  "solutionHeadingThree": "",
  "solutionDescriptionThree":"",
  "shortScopeTitleOne": "",
  "shortScopeTitleTwo": "",
  "shortScopeTitleThree": "",
  "shortScopeDescriptionOne": "",
  "shortScopeDescriptionTwo": "",
  "shortScopeDescriptionThree": "",
  "milestoneOneDay": "",
  "milestoneTwoDay": "",
  "milestoneThreeDay": "",
  "milestoneFourDay": "",
  "milestoneDescriptionOne": "",
  "milestoneDescriptionTwo": "",
  "milestoneDescriptionThree": "",
  "milestoneDescriptionFour": ""
}

Rules:
1. Use a professional but approachable tone that reflects DaeX AI's expertise
2. Focus on AI automation, workflow optimization, and measurable business outcomes
3. Ensure all fields are completed - no empty variables
4. Keep descriptions concise (14 words max for description fields)
5. Reference specific tools like n8n, Google Sheets, and messaging platforms when relevant
6. Include realistic timelines based on project complexity

{
  "companyName":"TechStart Solutions",
  "problem": "Manual lead qualification process taking 4+ hours daily, missing follow-ups, inconsistent customer communication",
  "solution": "AI-powered lead scoring system, automated email sequences, integrated CRM with smart notifications",
  "scope": "n8n workflow automation, Google Sheets integration, WhatsApp/Email automation, 30-day setup with training",
  "currentDate":"June 20 2025",
  "howSoon": "within 6 weeks",
  "depositCost": "$2,500",
}

{
  "proposalTitle": "AI Automation System for TechStart Solutions",
  "descriptionName": "intelligent lead management and customer engagement automation designed to scale your operations",
  "oneParagraphProblemSummary": "TechStart Solutions is currently spending 4+ hours daily on manual lead qualification, missing critical follow-ups, and struggling with inconsistent customer communication. This manual approach is preventing growth and creating inefficiencies that compound as your business scales. Our AI automation system will eliminate these bottlenecks and create a seamless, intelligent workflow that operates 24/7.",
  "solutionHeadingOne": "AI-Powered Lead Scoring & Qualification",
  "solutionDescriptionOne": "Automated system that scores and qualifies leads instantly using intelligent algorithms.",
  "solutionHeadingTwo": "Smart Email & WhatsApp Automation",
  "solutionDescriptionTwo": "Personalized messaging sequences that nurture leads and maintain consistent customer communication.",
  "solutionHeadingThree": "Integrated CRM with Smart Notifications",
  "solutionDescriptionThree": "Centralized system with intelligent alerts ensuring no opportunities are missed.",
  "shortScopeTitleOne": "n8n Workflow Development",
  "shortScopeTitleTwo": "Google Sheets CRM Integration",
  "shortScopeTitleThree": "30-Day Setup with Training",
  "shortScopeDescriptionOne": "Custom automation workflows built specifically for your lead management process.",
  "shortScopeDescriptionTwo": "Seamless integration with your existing data and communication tools.",
  "shortScopeDescriptionThree": "Complete setup, testing, and team training for immediate implementation.",
  "milestoneOneDay": "July 1st, 2025",
  "milestoneTwoDay": "July 15th, 2025",
  "milestoneThreeDay": "July 25th, 2025",
  "milestoneFourDay": "August 1st, 2025",
  "milestoneDescriptionOne": "System architecture designed and n8n workflows built.",
  "milestoneDescriptionTwo": "Google Sheets integration and messaging automation configured.",
  "milestoneDescriptionThree": "Complete system testing and initial optimization.",
  "milestoneDescriptionFour": "Team training completed and system fully operational."
}

parameters.message:
=Hi {{ $('On form submission').item.json['First Name'] }},

Great connecting with you today. I've put together a detailed automation proposal that addresses the specific challenges we discussed for {{ $('On form submission').item.json['Company Name'] }}.

View your proposal here: https://docs.google.com/presentation/d/{{ $json.presentationId }}/edit

This outlines exactly how we'll streamline your operations and boost efficiency with our AI automation systems. The solution is designed specifically for your needs and includes everything from setup to training.

Happy to jump on a quick call to walk through any questions or discuss next steps.

Best,
David Olusola
CEO, DaeX AI
